== Policy Proposals ==

This Page is for Proposing Policies and giving feedback on proposed policies. Please abide by the code of conduct and be respectful of others suggestions, no matter how you consider them. Please also add new policy proposals to the bottom of the list.

Once you have added your proposal, please email the Ubuntu IRC list at  to obtain feedback. 

'''Do not comment on this page''''

The IRCC Reserves the right to remove policy proposals as it sees fit.
